column1: 05:09|“You’ll have one by the side of your bed in a few years’ time
column2: so you wouldn’t even need to go into your office
column4: letting her head fall back on the pillow when she saw 5:09 flick up on the bedside clock.|Sons of Fortune|Jeffrey Archer

column1: 05:09|The primal flush of triumph which had saturated the American's humor on this signal success
column2: proved but fictive and transitory when inquiry of the station attendants educed the information that the two earliest trains to be obtained were the 5:09 to Dunkerque and the 5:37 for Ostend.|The Black Bag|Louis Joseph Vance
